{"products":[{"product_id":"gid://shopify/Product/7420052832338","title":"Cupid Called","description":"Get three warm shades in our coveted heart compacts! These rich blushes glide on smoothly and leave cheeks with a natural and healthy flush. The finely-milled formula contains silky powders that adhere to the skin, providing long wear and colour that stays true all day! These soft blushes blend evenly and can be layered to your desired intensity. Shades Included:Kiss ‘N Tell: Matte mid-tone warm nudeLet’s Dance: Matte warm peachy pink4ever Yours: Matte warm coral red","url":"https://colourpop.com/products/cupid-called-blush-set","image_url":"https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/1338/0845/files/Bundle-CupidCalled.jpg?v=1736986732","price_range":{"min":"32.0","max":"32.0","currency":"USD"},"product_type":"Heart Powder Blush Set","tags":["#.collection:promoproducts","#.hidden:false","011625","event:V-Day Heart Blush Bundles","sets + bundles"],"variants":[{"variant_id":"gid://shopify/ProductVariant/41327513698386","title":"Default Title","price":"32.0","currency":"USD","image_url":"https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/1338/0845/files/Bundle-CupidCalled.jpg?v=1736986732","available":true}]},{"product_id":"gid://shopify/Product/6966994403410","title":"Coastal Drive","description":"Our creamy, dreamy Blush Stix are the easiest to use ever. markdown to render product titles as links to their respective product pages using the URL property.

For product data:
- If variants are included in the response, those are the only variants available
- If variants are not included, use the options and availability matrix with get_product_details tool
- Check product_type, tags, and other properties to help the user find what they need

For filters:
- Mention available filters to the user if they might be helpful
- Use filters ONLY from available_filters in follow-up searches
- If a search term matches a filter, do a follow-up search with the filter applied

For pagination:
- Show only the first set of results initially
- If pagination.hasNextPage is true, ask if the user wants to see more
- Only fetch additional pages when explicitly requested
